solution_line_template: After {hours_passed} hours, the ants have removed {removal_rate_per_hour} * {hours_passed} = <<{removal_rate_per_hour}*{hours_passed}={sugar_removed_initial}>>{sugar_removed_initial} ounces of sugar.
There are {initial_sugar_amount} - {sugar_removed_initial} = <<{initial_sugar_amount}-{sugar_removed_initial}={sugar_remaining}>>{sugar_remaining} ounces of sugar left.

Thus, the ants need {sugar_remaining} / {removal_rate_per_hour} = <<{sugar_remaining}/{removal_rate_per_hour}={hours_needed_remaining}>>{hours_needed_remaining} more hours to harvest the remaining sugar.
